item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello, World! Going to leave this first post here for right now. The goal today was to get a Hugo site up and running on Netlify and I’ve done that with very little effort. ðŸ’ª As everyone else has been saying, Netlify was an absolute dream to use. I don’t think it can get any more simplified. So here’s the To Do over the next week: Style this sucker!

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! Hi, my name is Jason. I’m a front-end web developer and designer living and working in Charlotte, North Carolina.
